titles.title: A bill to modify the provisions relating to formulations of Triasulfuron and Dicamba.
A bill to modify the provisions relating to formulations of Triasulfuron and Dicamba.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the provisions relating to formulations of Triasulfuron and Dicamba, and to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on them.
